Emil_Bergström.power_dynamic: equal colleagues, Sara slightly senior in rank but Emil has technical authority
Emil_Bergström.tension: Emil's cynicism vs Sara's determination. He worries she's fighting a losing battle.
Emil_Bergström.evolution: Will strengthen as cases get harder. Emil might find renewed purpose through Sara's persistence.

Yusuf_Hassan.power_dynamic: cat and mouse - Sara has legal authority, Yusuf has technical superiority and youth
Yusuf_Hassan.tension: Sara understands his motivations (economic marginalization) but can't excuse his crimes. Yusuf underestimates her human insight.
Yusuf_Hassan.evolution: Grudging respect will develop. Maybe ends in Sara offering deal rather than pure prosecution.

Chen_Wei.power_dynamic: Sara has all the power but needs Chen's cooperation
Chen_Wei.tension: Chen's fear vs Sara's need for information. Trust must be earned.
Chen_Wei.evolution: Sara will protect Chen and earn her trust, leading to testimony that cracks the smuggling case.

Katarina_Ek.power_dynamic: Sara has legal power, Katarina has moral defense (economic desperation)
Katarina_Ek.tension: Sara sees her father in Katarina - economic victim turned criminal. Personal parallel makes her both sympathetic and harsh.
Katarina_Ek.evolution: Complicated. Sara might advocate for leniency while still prosecuting. Katarina represents Sara's fear of what desperation does to good people.

Yusuf_Hassan.power_dynamic: Peers in skill, Yusuf has edge in innovation, Emil has resources
Yusuf_Hassan.tension: Emil might recognize Yusuf's technical signature. Professional respect despite being on opposite sides.
Yusuf_Hassan.evolution: Could develop into recruitment conversation - Emil trying to turn Yusuf informant or even hire him.

Chen_Wei.power_dynamic: Emil has technical knowledge to understand port systems, Chen has specialized knowledge
Chen_Wei.tension: Emil's forensics vs Chen's careful compartmentalization
Chen_Wei.evolution: Emil will be gentle, recognizing her fear. Might be the one who convinces Sara to offer protection.

Katarina_Ek.power_dynamic: Emil understands her technical limitations, which makes her crimes seem almost pathetic
Katarina_Ek.tension: Emil sees her as amateur hour compared to Yusuf, but she's still causing real harm
Katarina_Ek.evolution: Minimal - side case for Emil while Yusuf is his real focus

Katarina_Ek.power_dynamic: Don't know each other. Yusuf is sophisticated; Katarina is amateur.
Katarina_Ek.tension: None directly. Represent different tiers of algorithmic crime.
Katarina_Ek.evolution: Might never meet. Thematic parallel rather than plot connection.

Chen_Wei.evolution: No direct relationship. Both are examples of economic pressure creating crime.

Katarina_Ek.evolution: Parallel stories of economic crime, won't intersect

central_nodes: Sara Lindqvist - connects all storylines as investigator
Emil Bergström - technical hub, connects to all cases through forensics
isolated_clusters: The three criminal operations are separate initially
Sara and Emil discover they're all using similar algorithmic exploitation techniques
This realization is a key plot development
power_flows: Police have legal authority but are technically outmatched
Criminals have technical power but are economically/socially vulnerable
Information is the real power - who knows what, when

theme_reinforcement.Sara_Emil: Human insight vs technical capability - need both
theme_reinforcement.Sara_criminals: System creates crime, but individuals make choices
theme_reinforcement.All_relationships: Power is contextual - everyone has something the other needs
